channel.title: ~@pkparadise v2@~
channel.description:
[size=20pt]hey guys welcome to my v2 server i have done much more now compared to my v1 so i hope you enjoy the base is again of reapagescape so... ill be thanking the reaper again. in the pictures you will see what i have changed if you downloaded or looked at my v1 server so here it goes.[/size]
[size=30pt]PLEASE COMMENT TO KEEP THE TOPIC ALIVE PLEASE THANKS[/size] __________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0000.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0001.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0010.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0004-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0003-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0005-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0002-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0007-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0008.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0009.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0010.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0011.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0012-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0013.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0014.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i598.photobucket.com/albums/tt66/proboy407/evolved0015-1.png[/img]
[size=20pt]there are the pictures,every skill works now every single 1 witch is good now, i blocked of dragons 2 tele because that had faults with it but i dunno if it had faults for other people i made a new shop witch has rares i have also added a new staff room witch i said ill change in v1 but i havnt really added much in the staff room you can add some stuff if you want in the staff room to make it look better :)
[size=20pt]starter outfit and starter: outfit-zerker helm fighter torso black d hide chaps fury climbing boots dharock gloves mining cape and rune defender[/size] [size=20pt]starter-50m bandos gs whip 100m food 1m bones 1m rune ess(you will need the ess for skills.) i think every spec works apart from mabey 1 or 2 weapons so ill try fix that in v3[/size]
ok here are the credits
viet ownage - 35% for making the rest the reaper-30% for base mod allstar-10% for skills me-25% for adding home,staffroom,shops,jad,pkbox new veng, and now all 21 skills work.
here is the download link[/size] V2 http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?djnmxmmm2nm http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?djnmxmmm2nm http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?djnmxmmm2nm http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?djnmxmmm2nm http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?djnmxmmm2nm V1 http://uppit.com/SDEGVG http://uppit.com/SDEGVG http://uppit.com/SDEGVG http://uppit.com/SDEGVG

item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“kfortjr, post:8, topic:271660”][size=30pt]hmmmm… drag-pkz based leecher! same stuff like … is the student he/ she came… thats what drag-pkz says when you log in and its the same portals and shops as drag-pkz scape, plus the same starting gear… =( NOOB LEACHER!!!/size][/quote]Shut up. People release sources for a reason. FOR PEOPLE TO USE THEM. Just because you see a source that you’ve played on DOESN’T mean you have the right to bitch on people’s threads. Now shut the fuck up and get some respect.

Why do you use the Brush tool.
There’s text, And transparency for a reason.
But looks good.

item.title: ~@pkparadise v2@~
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“project courage, post:1, topic:272091”][quote author=O I3 I3 Y link=topic=358492.msg2739918#msg2739918 date=1239265929]
You Copyrighted Someone’s Server Vi3t0wnag3 made that.
Btw there’s no such thing as Dharock Glove’s And Dharok’s ain’t spelled like that 2nd of all it’s Barrow’s glove’s.
You Need Alot Of Help Don’t You Don’t Copyright Server’s for Rep++ Etc.
You Will Find that some people will know that you copyrighted these server’s.
Good Luck Trying to Noob Copyrighter. Vi3t0wnag3 was out nearly 2 year’s ago and you just copied all of it and just renamed rofl.

[size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt]NO COPYRIGHTER’S![/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]
[/quote]
I don’t think you have any idea what you really mean, a copyright is a registered ‘thing’ that is not allowed to be impersonated, you copyright by using and official copyrighting company, or filing your own copyrightation. But if you mean leeching, please post some proof.

On-topic: The training is way overcrowded and looks laggy as hell! Also the vengeance graphics are outdated, don’t post a download link to the same thing using the same service such as mediafire, more than once. You obviously have no idea what an economy is, I really doubt you have 50% of the credits and doubt that all skills work 100% as this would be an almost exact RuneScape version 317 copy, and putting percentages on your credits looks childish and greedy, and shows that you are grabbing for more reputation, just make a list of names, and at the end put ‘Anyone who participated or contributed in any way, shape or form’ this avoids pointless arguments about people not being acreditted correctly.[/quote]

Seems a little harsh Pro C, but yeah i do agree.

Read full topic
